content.question: The region bounded by the graph of y = 2x - x2 and the x-axis is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is an equilateral triangle. What is the volume of the solid?

topic.text: 8.8: Volumes with Cross Sections - Triangles and Semicircles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
